page.title: 18HOLY TRINITY CHURCH
page.content: HOLY TRINITY CHURCH IN S.W.F. SERVES ROMAN CATHOLICS , CHURCH OF ENGLAND AND METHODIST PARISHONERS. IT IS IN THE TOWN CENTRE AND IN BETWEEN ST. MARY'S C. OF E. PRIMARY SCHOOL AND ST. JOSEPH'S R.C. PRIMARY SCHOOL. THE TWO SCHOOLS ARE ACTUALLY JOINED TO THE CHURCH BY THEIR HALLS. PARTITIONS CAN BE OPENED TO USE THE HALLS TO ENLARGEN THE CHURCH. THE DENOMINATIONS SHARE THE CHURCH BUT THE SCHOOLS DO HAVE THEIR OWN HEAD TEACHERS AND GOVERNING BODIES. THE ALTAR FURNITURE HAS BEEN HAND CARVED BY MR. LES HOLDEN WHO LIVES IN S.W.F. AND IS WELL KNOWN AS A LOCAL HISTORY EXPERT.
